skill.name: Project Setup & Architecture
skill.description: Set up project infrastructure including TypeScript, database, state management, navigation, and testing. Use when initializing new features or configuring development environment.
skill.summary: Set up project infrastructure including TypeScript, database, state management, navigation, and test...
skill.author: BabakBar

security_audit.summary: This is a pure markdown documentation skill containing no executable code. The file only provides guidance and templates for setting up React Native/Expo projects. No file system access, network calls, or code execution capabilities are present beyond reading the skill documentation itself.

content.value_statement: Need to configure TypeScript, database, state management, navigation, and testing for your React Native project? This skill provides step-by-step guidance for initializing project infrastructure with Expo SDK.
actual_capabilities: Configure TypeScript with strict mode and Expo integration
Set up SQLite database with Drizzle ORM
limitations: Requires manual verification of each step
Does not handle complex database migrations

use_cases.title: Initialize new project
use_cases.description: Set up complete React Native project infrastructure from scratch with TypeScript, database, and testing.

use_cases.title: Standardize architecture
use_cases.description: Apply consistent project structure and tooling across team members for maintainable codebase.

use_cases.title: Add new features
use_cases.description: Create properly structured feature modules with components, hooks, services, and types.

prompt_templates.title: New TypeScript project
prompt_templates.prompt: Use project-setup skill to set up a new React Native project with TypeScript, Expo SQLite database, and Zustand state management.

prompt_templates.title: Add testing
prompt_templates.prompt: Use project-setup skill to install and configure Jest and React Native Testing Library in my Expo project.

prompt_templates.title: Database setup
prompt_templates.prompt: Use project-setup skill to set up Drizzle ORM with Expo SQLite including schema and migration structure.

prompt_templates.title: Create feature module
prompt_templates.prompt: Use project-setup skill to create a new feature module with proper directory structure for components, hooks, services, and types.

output_examples.input: Set up my React Native project with TypeScript and database
output: TypeScript configuration with strict mode enabled
Drizzle ORM + Expo SQLite database setup
Zustand store template for state management

best_practices: Install and configure one system at a time to isolate issues
Use npx expo install for Expo SDK packages to ensure compatibility
Commit to version control after each successful setup step
anti_patterns: Installing all dependencies at once without verifying each one works
Skipping TypeScript strict mode for convenience
Not testing the setup before adding more dependencies

faq.question: What React Native versions are supported?
faq.answer: Works with Expo SDK 54+ and React Native 0.81. Follows Expo's official TypeScript recommendations.

faq.question: Can I use this with plain React Native?
faq.answer: Yes. The skill focuses on Expo workflows but TypeScript, Drizzle, and Zustand setup applies to any React Native project.

faq.question: How long does setup take?
faq.answer: Full project setup typically takes 15-30 minutes depending on your experience. Each component can be set up independently.

faq.question: Does this modify my existing files?
faq.answer: No. This skill provides guidance and templates. You apply changes manually to maintain control over your project.

faq.question: What database options are supported?
faq.answer: Primary focus is Expo SQLite with Drizzle ORM. The patterns can adapt to other databases like Async Storage for simple needs.

faq.question: How is this different from Expo prebuild?
faq.answer: This skill configures the application layer (TypeScript, state, testing). Expo prebuild handles native project generation.
